To use ramfs image:
 * Ñreate a separate folder
 * place there necessary files
 * cd into this folder
 * find . -depth -print | cpio -H newc -ov > ../ramfs.cpio
 * fix path in the option(RAMFS_CPIO, "path/ramfs.cpio")
 * mount cpio /ramfs
